title: Countries Incidents
desc:
This mod was created thanks to our players, that helped us to fill form about incidents popularities in their countries. 

We believe it will give you more immersive gameplay with more realistic incidents frequency in country of your choice.

Affected countries are:
AU, AT, BE, BR, CA, CR, CZ, DK, GB, FI, FR, DE, HK, HU, IT, NL, NZ, NO, PH, PL, RO, RU, ES, SE, CH, UA, US
